channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Parameterized Remote Trigger Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Parameterized Remote Trigger Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2239|2024-08-04T07:01:41.273Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20parameterized%20remote%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Parameterized Remote Trigger Plugin 3.1.3 and earlier stores a secret unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by attackers with access to the Jenkins controller file system.
